医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
导管引导溶栓可能为肺栓塞高危患者提供更安全的选择肺栓塞（PE）是一种由肺部血栓引起的危及生命的疾病，长期以来一直对全世界的患者构成重大风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Catheter-directed-thrombothesis-may-offer-a-safer-alternative-for-high-risk-病人-with-pulmonary-embolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Catheter-directed-thrombolism-may-offer-a-safer-alternative-for-high-risk-病人-with-pulmonary-embolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=772f9981-6f40-411a-a8d2-f5ca4d6394ed Mon, 31 Jul 2023 13:52:34 -0400 Catheter-directed thrombolysis may offer a safer alternative for high-risk patients with pulmonary embolism
新发现的蛋白质在新兴抗癌疗法的作用中发挥着关键作用科学家们发现了一种蛋白质，它在几种新兴癌症疗法的作用中发挥着关键作用。研究人员表示，这一发现可能有助于微调免疫疗法针对几种具有挑战性的癌症的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Newly-identified- Protein-plays-a-key-role-in-the-action-of-emerging-anticancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Newly-identified- Protein-plays-a-key-role-in-the-action-of-emerging-anticancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e890e5cd-44b6-4074-8ef7-cc509b9e0bda Mon, 31 Jul 2023 13:44:48 -0400 Newly identified protein plays a key role in the action of emerging anticancer therapies
对当前学校膳食营养标准的适度更新可能会带来显着的健康益处今天的学校膳食比美国孩子的父母的健康得多，但仍有四分之一的学校膳食营养质量较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Modest-updates-to-current-school-meal-nutrition-standards-could-lead-to-significant-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Modest-updates-to-current-school-meal-nutrition-standards-could-lead-to-significant-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=244b9170-ce63-40c6-9563-ed8c93f33852 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 13:26:32 -0400 Modest updates to current school meal nutrition standards could lead to significant health benefits
Scrambler 疗法：慢性疼痛的新型非侵入性治疗方法两位约翰·霍普金斯大学疼痛专家共同撰写的一篇新评论论文表明，扰频疗法（一种非侵入性疼痛治疗方法）可以显着缓解大约 80%–90% 的慢性疼痛患者，并且可能比其他非侵入性疗法更有效：经皮神经电刺激（TENS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Scrambler-therapy-A-new-non-having-treatment-for-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Scrambler-therapy-A-new-non-having-treatment-for-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6071c936-6c51-4184-8271-2eca006a408c Mon, 31 Jul 2023 12:57:42 -0400 Scrambler therapy: A new non-invasive treatment for chronic pain
研究为细菌感染患者如何出现抗菌药物耐药性提供了新的见解牛津大学领导的一项研究为细菌感染患者如何出现抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 提供了革命性的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-offers-new-insight-into-how-antimicrobial-resistance-emerges-in-病人-with-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-offers-new-insight-into-how-antimicrobial-resistance-emerges-in-病人-with-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e12b423-5bad-40b9-9c9a-5be97f3b3752 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 12:24:05 -0400 Study offers new insight into how antimicrobial resistance emerges in patients with bacterial infections
老年人神经元活动和大脑氧合之间的协调发生变化研究老年人大脑活动的研究人员表示，神经元活动和大脑氧合之间的协调发生了变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Coordination- Between-neuronal-activity-and-brain-oxygenation-altered-in-older-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Coordination- Between-neuronal-activity-and-brain-oxygenation-altered-in-older-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c5c361e-2bb9-4408-8d79-01ecb61c4549 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 11:14:58 -0400 Coordination between neuronal activity and brain oxygenation altered in older people
NIH 续奖 1150 万美元，支持压力如何影响心血管健康的研究社会心理压力深刻影响着全球人们的生活，尤其是因为它可能是心血管疾病的关键危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/24115-million-award-renewal-from-NIH-supports-study-of-how-stress-influences-cardioangio-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/24115-million-award-renewal-from-NIH-supports-study-of-how-stress-influences-cardioangio-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac9768c2-7243-4506-a7ae-95c4a4e37c72 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 11:07:22 -0400 $11.5 million award renewal from NIH supports study of how stress influences cardiovascular health
试验评估嘌呤 P2X7 受体拮抗剂 JNJ-54175446 对重度抑郁症患者的疗效研究人员在一项双盲、多中心、随机对照试验 (RCT) 中研究了 JNJ-54175446 的安全性和药代动力学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Trial-evaluates-purine-P2X7-receptor-antagonist-JNJ-54175446-in-病人-with-major-depressive-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Trial-evaluates-purine-P2X7-receptor-antagonist-JNJ-54175446-in-患者-with-major-depressive-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f7cb484-d712-4f7d-bec1-c55958b7b5cf Mon, 31 Jul 2023 10:48:00 -0400 Trial evaluates purine P2X7 receptor antagonist JNJ-54175446 in patients with major depressive disorder
性别认同与青少年的社交媒体使用和心理健康有关吗？一项针对美国跨性别、非二元性别和顺性别青少年的横断面研究着眼于社交媒体使用与心理健康指标之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Is-gender-identity-linked-with-social-media-use-and-mental-health-among-youths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Is-gender-identity-linked-with-social-media-use-and-mental-health-among-youths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3389f6f9-ea0f-471e-b556-eb9544eb433a Mon, 31 Jul 2023 10:41:00 -0400 Is gender identity associated with social media use and mental health among youths?
